name: LeaderPost
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Leader Post Flash Briefing brings to you the latest in news from your city - Regina, Canada and around the world.
Search for Leader Post in your Alexa Skills app and Enable the skill. Move the skill up to the top of the list by navigating to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.
After activating Alexa in your device, you may say “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing?”, or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest news from your reliable news source at any time of the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
